MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the ML7 postcode area of Shotts. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete a repair due to an underground mains fault at Shotts, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:55am. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:03am on Friday, 30 October 2020
